letter.title: My Dearest Pattukutty,
content: From the moment you walked into my life, everything began to feel warmer, brighter, and more meaningful âœ¨

You are my first experience of love, and Iâ€™m so grateful that itâ€™s you. I once felt like a person without feelings â€” almost like a little â€˜roboâ€™ â€” but you turned me into someone with a beating heart, and now it beats only for you ğŸ¤
Before you, my life felt like a desertâ€¦ empty and silent. You came in and turned everything upside down, and now it feels like a beautiful rainforest â€” full of life, colour, and warmth ğŸŒ¿
You were right in front of me all along, yet it took 28 years for us to truly meet. I guess beautiful things take time âœ¨
And when the time is right, love comes like a storm â€” sweeping us off our feet, just like it did to us ğŸŒ§ï¸ğŸ’«
Loving you comes so effortlessly â€” in your smile, your laughter, and the quiet comfort I feel whenever Iâ€™m with you ğŸ’
You are my forever. When I look into your eyes, I can see our whole life ahead â€” filled with happiness and all the little moments weâ€™ll share ğŸ¤
So tell meâ€¦ will you accept me as your forever? ğŸ’
